reviews.review:
IN  THE  GAME  PORTAL  YOU  PLAYS  AS  A  ESCAPED  LADY  BUT  YOU  HAVE  A  GUN  WITCH  SHOOT  2  PORTALS.  AND  IF  YOU  SHOOT  A  ONE  PORTAL  ON  THE  CEILING  AND  SHOOT  A  ON  THE  FLOOR,  YOU  LOOK  THROUGH  AND  YOU  SEE  RE-CURSIVE.  AND  A MACHINE  TRY  TO  KILL  YOU.

CASEY  SULLIVAN,  SOUTH BOSTON
Puzzles, portals, cute turrets and promises of cake. It's Portal. If you somehow haven't played this yet... WHAT WERE YOU THINKING? Go pick it up, NOW. Seriously. Do it.

A dream realized for those in the midst of dealing with dog poop, floor-based laundry and comical/fatal effect with anvils.

Portal takes the application of physics in gaming as a concept... and then goes absolutely batsh*t insane. Armed with a gun that can only fire two connecting portals anywhere, a malfunctioning and evil/funny computer puts you to task in overcoming "tests" it has laid out for you where you must gradually overcome amusingyl difficult and increasingly dangerous puzzles.

It's practically a perfect game that doesn't overstay its welcome with overly padded crap, nor does it leave you unsatisfied as an amazing story unfolds within a mysterious, ruined lab and a series of failed predecessors who were not so fortunate in their testing.

Portal is amazing on its own, but it's best in its natural environment with the rest of the orange box. If you don't already own portal, fix that now. It's that good and you'll never look at cake the same again.
Spectacular. You appear to understand how this recommendation affects forward momentum, or to be more precise, how it does not.
Muy buena historia y muy original!!
Blue and Orange makes fun.

Un bon petit jeu de logique utilisant des principes physiques courants et d'application ludique pour avancer dans un scénario divertissant et dont l'objectif qui est de fuir, se réalise de façon captivante.
Still holds up, easily one of my favorite games.

I liked this game a lot, but in the end... after finishing it... I realized that I just payed $30 for a game that lasted 3 or 4 hours... tops. While amazing and awesome and blah blah blah good, I really wish I would have waited to pay what you could pay for it now... which would have been an amazing value.

But anyway... may be I'm not so stoked and thrilled because I'm not really a puzzle person. I dunno... it's still really good and really fun and totally worth the cheap ass price you can get it for now.

By far, and with by far I mean by a few light years or so, the best game I've ever played. The story is the most awesome (and to be honest most shortest for a game), I've ever experienced. If you are in my friend list and do not own this game yet, and I hope the best for you I'll never find out, you are one of the few people eligible for an instant kick from my list. Seriously. Get it before I know you didn't yet.
Dude, its fucking Portal. Best 3 hours of my life. Get it now.
Taste the Aperture Science!

The game keeps saying the cake is a lie. You know what's a bigger lie? Bitcoin. I spent $6000 on this new computer to mine this stuff and it hasn't resulted in anything. Now all it's good for is occasionally logging onto steam in between filing for bankruptcy and helping my wife move everything out of the house since some soyboy judge decided she and the kids shouldn't entrust their finances to someone like me.

Anyway, the game has some decent puzzles here and there, the ending song was funny. Almost funny enough to make me forget about this month's alimony payment. God I want to end it all.
portal is good
Remember, the Aperture Science 'Bring Your Daughter to Work Day' is the perfect time to have her tested.
タレットかわいいです。ED曲がお気に入り。頭の体操にお勧め。
if you like games where you are armed with a gun that shoots a gateway to another gateway that you can shoot out and that would be how you pass obstacle courses, then this is the game for you
One of the best games I played, a bit short though.. Cant wait for Portal 2 COOP :)
포탈 굿~
Although short, Portal is an excellent game worth giving a shot, plenty of portal based puzzles and plenty of dark humor will keep you entertained.
A very well polished digestible puzzle adventure romp.  The playful design and unique gameplay last just as long as it should and never gets boring.
¡Uno de los mejores juegos que he conocido!
The sequel to Motion Sickness Simulator 2006.
The cake may be a lie... but the awesomeness of this game is not!
Short game but uterly brilliant for every minute.  This is a classic not to be missed.

you have NO excuse not to get this game. it is on sale, it has great gameplay, great atmosphere, great writing, and CAKE. even if it was not on sale, it would still be a great deal for clearly one of the most memorable games you will ever play. buy it.
This game is one of the best games Valve has ever made!
頭を使う斬新なFPSパズルゲーム

Portal is probably the most simple yet extremely complex game game out there. The concept is fairly simple as an idea (use weapon-generated portals to navigate through levels) but the actual gameplay and the multitude of different approaches is phenomenal, insane. 
I cannot explain this game in words, it has more atmosphere and feeling than most high budget games out there. But this is a test game, a testing platform that heralds greater things and creations.
Buy this game, play it and realise why everyone is obsessed with the cake being a lie, or lying cakes and companion cubes. 

You will never forget this game, i promise you. You will never forget this game, ever...
Portal besteh aus 3 Dingen: Portale, Companion Cubes und nicht existenter Kuchen. Ein Gehirnschmalz forderndes Rasantes Spiel. 2 Daumen Hochen und einen Zeigefinger in den Kuchen ;)

Good Game !!!
Never gets old, from time to time I come back to this one.

Such a great game!  The creative possibility behind such a simple game is worth all the money I spent for it.

If steam has a special for this, it's a must buy.
If you love solving puzzles this game really gets you thinking.  But the best part of this game is the humor and the cake!
All PC owners should own this game. Simple as that.
The cake is a lie.
I recommend portal.  It is fun.  Enjoy the last day of the treasure hunt.
Sencillamente, una puta obra maestra, desafia la física, la lógica y déjate llevar...

If you're looking for one of the best single-player experiences out there look no further than Portal! Possible to beat in around six to eight hours Portal shines in its polish as a first person puzzle game. Do not miss this one!
If you haven't played it yet, you have been living under a rock, Especially since it was given away for free.
This game is one of the most interesting one ive ever played.

Wow, what a game. Portal is one of those really brilliant games that comes along and takes everything with a storm.
Portal is a 1st person puzzle game. You control a silent and unknown protagonist doomed to do puzzles over and over by an evil (and coolest) machine entity.
The key features in the gameplay revolves around you solving puzzles using a gun shooting portals. This in itself may not sound that awesome, but you really have to experience the puzzles to percieve the cleverness (Is that even a word?) behind them. The gameplay has a natural difficulty curve with the game becoming harder and harder. It never feels annoying though, the hard part in this game is to figure out the puzzle. Usually you have a good amount of time to figure it out, and when you finally do, it feels very rewarding completing the darn thing.
The graphics are nothing to call home about. They are descent.
The very best thing in the game is by far the story. Considering all you do is solving puzzles, this may sound strange, but one key element changes this. The machine that has kept you trapped for "Testing" is one of the best characters created in many years. The constant barrage of comments and sarcasm delivered with an amazing voice is just fantastic. Combine this with an atmosphere where you find yourself insignificant, lost and utterly alone gives a really unique gaming experience.
Ein wenig kurz, aber es kostet ja auch nicht viel. Ein tolles Spiel, knackige Rätsel und unglaublich witzige Dialoge - ein muss für jeden, der schwarzen Humor mag und kein Blut braucht.
Portal ist ein einzigartiges, super tolles Spiel, bei dem nicht nur Geschiklichkeit sondern auch Logik eine wichtige Rolle spielt.

This is a great game
if you are a fan of physics puzzle games and dark humor tere is absolutetly no reason oyu shouldn't give this game a try.
This game makes a portal into your head

Portal ist mit eines der faszinierendsten und inovativsten Spiele die ich kenne.
Die Atmosphäre die einen tief in die Gemäuer von Aperture Science ziehen ist bedrohend und atemberaubend zugleich
You have to play this game, you have no choice in the matter

Uno de los mejores juegos de la última decada , una combinación de FPS, puzzle, y aventura practicamente perfecta, ambientación y diseño impecables,  en un juego que, pese a su aparente "frialdad" desprende carisma y sentido del humor  por todos lados . Toda una obra maestra.
Great game for those who like puzzle games and doesn't require a powerful PC/MAC.
un juego indispensable!! para siempre
Very Fun puzzle type game with PORTALS! ;P  beware, the puzzles can get a little complicated ;)

This is a delightful game!  Forcing the player to think to solve the puzzles presented and its replay value lies in the challenges and achievements. Definitely worth picking up if you don't own it already, it goes on sale often so grab it on sale and get it before Portal 2 comes!
터렛은 진리입니다.
good space and logical execrise

I love this game. The simplicity of the idea and how each level is essentially a tutorial to get to you to the final boss. The only disappointment that I have is that the game seems a little short, but makes up for it by having more challenges post game. I only wish there were a few more of the levels. 

Oh well... There's always Portal 2!

One of those "best games ever" that you keep on a special shelf in your heart. Calling it "3D puzzle game" is as insulting as calling Half Life 2 a "shooter". It's fun, it's intelligent, it's atmospheric and addictively entertaining. One of the rare cases when the game is born classic.
This is one of the funniest games I've ever played and might be my favorite game of all time.  If you haven't played it, your life isn't complete.
Perfect game!!!!
I would recommend this game to anyone who enjoys a good puzzle.  You will find that thinking with Portals is a fantastic thing to do and will allow you to look at things in a new...perspective.
Everyone should play this. Everyone should love this. If you don't you are subject to termination.
a simple premise executed brilliantly
This is a unique FPS experience unto itself.
It's Portal, there's not much more you need to say! If you've never played then what are you waiting for, if you have played then you want valve to count to 3.
The best puzzle game I've ever played.
One of the most creative and intelligent puzzle games ever developed, a true masterpiece.
the cake isn't a lie.

If a Minkowski spacetime contains a compact region Ω, and if the topology of Ω is of the form Ω ~ R x Σ, where Σ is a three-manifold of the nontrivial topology, whose boundary has topology of the form dΣ ~ S2, and if, furthermore, the hypersurfaces Σ are all spacelike, then the region Ω contains a quasipermanent intra-universe wormhole.
One of the best games of all times! Do yoursef a favour and play it.
This game is the icing on the cake.  Well, if there was cake...

Einfach nur KULT das wohl beeindruckendste Spiel was es bis jetz gab und das sogar gewaltfrei Oo

Ich wart nu auf den 2ten Teil der noch umfangreicher wird als Portal was eigentlich nur ein "Versuch" ist.
I can't believe some people still have not played Portal.

excellent jeu de reflexion que j'ai finis plusieurs fois
vivement PORTAL 2 en avril 2011

If you play any first-person shooters and don't mind some puzzles thrown in while being taunted by a crazy AI, Portal is a must play. One of the taglines is "Now you're thinking with portals."; throughout the game, you did improve your "portal-thinking" ability. When playing through a second time, I was able to do the earlier levels in a more efficient / cooler way because my portal-thinking ability was improved.

Rien que le concept de Portal vaut le détour. Derrière, de l'humour cynique et une ambiance malsaine mais pas trop viennent rythmer le scénario. Portal, c'est 5 heures de jeu pour l'aventure principale et au moins autant d'heures de jeu pour les défis qui sont très hardus. Arriverez-vous à manger le gâteau ?

As a Mac user, I was late to the party with this one, but to paraphrase NBC, "If you haven't played it before, it's new to you." This is not only a great game, but a great lesson in game design - after playing through, play it again with the developer commentary on. The comments on level design and how new concepts are introduced to the player helped explain why the game worked so well in terms of pacing/progression.

The levels are fun and challenging, the humor is excellent (particularly in the final scene), and the change in tone over the course of the game makes it hard to stop playing.

The challenge levels add great replay value - minor tweaks to the original levels and time/step/portal count challenges lead to entirely different approaches in some cases. In several cases either at the beginning of a challenge level or after seeing the trophy requirements I had to laugh out loud and say, "you've got to be kidding," which made the eventual achievement that much more satisfying.

Whoever hasn't played this game so far has missed out on the greaters puzzle game in 3D on the Source engine which was ever created. Seriously, I haven'T played such a nice brain teaser since "The incredible machine" and "Lemmings".

It's a must play

What at first appears to be a funny and well designed first person puzzle game turns into something so, so much more.

Yes, this really was a triumph.
If, for some inexplicable reason, you have not already played this game, you should take swift steps to rectify the situation.
Steamでお勧め一つ書くっつったらもうこれしか無いでしょう。発想がなにより素晴らしいですが、ゲームとしてのデザインも素晴らしい。SF的な雰囲気作りも完璧です。OrangePackで購入しましたが、FPSが特に好きでなければPortal単品で買うのもいいと思います。

If you haven't yet played Portal, get on it. I hate platforming. I hate jumping. I hate doing both of those things in a 3d environment.

I. Love. Portal.

Infinite charm, ingenious level design, unforgettable characters, the works. This game is the best platformer, best jumper, and one of the best games over all I've ever played. It's well-worth the price because you will never forget this game. Buy it now, play it now, and love it well.

A funny puzzle FPS.  There are no enemies to kill, but the commentary from GlAdOs is nothing short of entertaining.  The puzzles do a good job of eazing you into the game for the tougher puzzles at the end.

Plenty of cake in store for you, if you buy this. Cake and fun. No murder. Why would anyone try to murder you instead of giving you cake?

Oh, there's also portals. And puzzles. That's how you get the cake.
A great puzzler that will have you scratching your head and has many unique puzzle elements

Cada cierto tiempo, en el mundo de los videojuegos aparece una pequeña joyita que sorprende por su originalidad y su frescura. Proyectos que, además, suelen tener un presupuesto reducido y escasos medios para salir a la calle, o que por ser una apuesta arriesgada no tienen toda la publicidad que se merecen. Esta vez le toca el turno a la siempre sobresaliente Valve, con su breve pero impactante "Portal".

Ficha completa --> http://lavozenllamas.org/lvellsmf/index.php?topic=4847.msg59028#msg59028

Greatest puzzle game set in 3d. We love the use of Portals to solve levels. The Cubes, Turrets, and other objects have character to them. The story is deep too, with GlaDOS trying to kill you and having an odd personality. Like many of us said, the game is short, but Portal 2 may come up with more story and puzzle elements to keep us hooked. Portal is an amazing puzzle series that is easy to pick up but challenging to master well.
one of my favorites.
This is portal, portal 2 is coming out soon, you should play portal 1, one of the best games ever made
マジおすすめ
I love my weighted companion cube! ^^

This game is full of fun and thinking. When you start the game first time and play it throught, it is not that easy. But after the first time passing the game you will be playing it through very easily. BUT THATS NOT IT! Portal has "advanced" and "Challenge" maps that need MORE thinking with your own brains!


I recommend this game to everyone!!!

Have Fun!
Best. Game. Ever.
A great FPS game, that involves shooting portals, and not guns! The puzzles will definitely make you think. I highly recommend it no matter what price!
Science at its best.
Muy adictivo, capaz de pasartelo en un día sin cansarte, además te entran unas ganas de comerte una tarta... jajaja
Having steam and not playing portal is like having a coputer and not turning it on. This the first thing everyone should buy after they download steam.
Det här är ett spel som man måste ha spelat igenom.
this game is the best and most Immersive Puzzler out there. it brings a new genre to FPS!

Das beste und innovativste Spiel für die grauen Zellen, was ich (bisher) jemals gespielt habe...kann es nur wärmstens empfehlen!

Und wer meint, wenn er die 19 Level durchgespielt hat, dass er es geschafft hat, der sollte sich die Fortgeschrittenen-Level und Herausforderungen zu Gemüte führen und versuchen ALLE Errungenschaften zu erreichen ;-)  :-) ! ! !

Und selbst nach so vielen Jahren und dem genialen Nachfolger, der Portal um einiges getoppt und noch weiter verbessert hat (normaler Weise gelingt dies sehr selten bei einer Fortsetzung), so macht es mir immer noch riesigen Spass das Spiel nochmals zu spielen...ist und bleibt ein absoluter Klassiker und absolut GENIAL.  :-D

Portal... When I think Portal I think insane First Person Puzzles, leaping through walls, balls of energy knocking over android turrents, evil computer AI, and even Cake. If any of the above sounds interesting or romotely like something you would enjoy I would suggest purchasing this game.

Also is a great way to prepare for Portal 2 if any of the coverage for that intrigues you. Think of it as a Portal 2 Demo.
